messages.messageText: How the hell am I supposed to get a jury to believe you when I am not even sure that I do?!
When you re backed against the wall, break the god damn thing down.
Oh yeah, did Michael Jordan tell you that?
What are your choices when someone puts a gun to your head?
What are you talking about? You do what they say or they shoot you.
Wrong. You take the gun, or you pull out a bigger one. Or, you call their bluff. Or, you do any one of hundred and forty six other things.

users.name: Louis Litt

users.perview: We'll meet again, Mike. Tell Jessica I said 'Hi'.

users.name: Rachel Zane
users.perview: I was thinking that we could have chicken tonight, sounds good?

users.name: Donna Paulsen
users.perview: Mike, I know everything! I'm Donna..

users.name: Jessica Pearson
users.perview: Have you finished the draft on the Hinsenburg deal?
